name: Power's out!
description:
The power is out in your house, fix it!

Instructions are in-game.

Game can be played without 360 tracking, can also be played standing only assuming you have some space to swing your arms.

This is a VR-ONLY game made for Ludum Dare 38 in under 72 hours by 1 person.

Don't expect too much.

It runs on SteamVR, so whatever you have with controllers that works with that should work with this game.

Only tested on HTC Vive but should work for anything else SteamVR accepts.

LDJam link: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/powers-out
